definition: A term commonly used to describe food products that do not contain a certain component, often associated with grains, which some individuals may need to avoid due to dietary restrictions or health reasons.

examples.german: Mein Freund isst nur glutenfreie Lebensmittel.
examples.english: My friend only eats gluten-free food.

examples.german: Das Restaurant bietet glutenfreie Optionen an.
